subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
Support to National Commission for Women and Children for Mainsteaming Gender and Women's Empowerment in Bhutan.
- Enhanced national capacity in awareness raising, implementation and reporting of ratified international conventions and treaties.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Mainstreaming Gender support
